description: Application for a non-material amendment to planning permission Ref:P1766.23 dated 28/06/2024 to allow for amendments to approved plans (Demolition of the existing building and storage lockers to rear of site; redevelopment of the site to provide a standalone building to be operated as a self-storage facility (Class B8 use), with a GIA of 1,487sqm; provision of 16 car parking spaces, including 1 disabled bay and 3 electric charging bay; provision of 6 short-stay cycle car parking spaces; provision of refuse storage to rear of site)
decision_conditions: The amendment to the approved application listed below are considered to be of a minor nature and would not constitute a material change to the appearance of the dwelling.
The proposed changes are deemed acceptable:
The introduction of Bi-folding gate to replace sliding gate
8no. EV bays shown to comply with planning condition (50%).
Bin store relocated to aid circulation.
Pedestrian / cycle route line marking removed within rear car park Ã?¢?? this will be a shared access
Line marking and protection introduced in service yard / customer parking area to meet standards and operator requirements.
Introduction of new external door next to rear roller shutter door.
PV panels relocated to south-east to allow for a safe means of roof access.
Minor pitch change to north-east and south-west to allow for steels to intersect efficiently.
Introduction of new external doors to south-east and north-east elevations

The applicant is advised that this amendment relates solely to the item detailed above as shown on the drawings hereby approved. This amendment does not in any way alter or remove any previous conditions imposed on the original approved application reference P1766.23 dated 28/06/2024.
